(It starts with one) One thing, I don't know why
It doesn't even matter how hard you try
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To explain in due time all I know
Time is a valuable thing
Watch it fly by as the pendulum swings
Watch it count down to the end of the day
The clock ticks life away, it's so unreal (It's so unreal)
Didn't look out below
Watch the time go right out the window
Tryin' to hold on, didn't even know
I wasted it all just to watch you go

I kept everything inside
And even though I tried, it all fell apart
What it meant to me will eventually be
A memory of a time when I tried so hard

I tried so hard and got so far
But in the end it doesn't even matter
I had to fall to lose it all
But in the end it doesn't even matter

One thing, I don't know why
It doesn't even matter how hard you try
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To remind myself how I tried so hard
In spite of the way you were mockin' me
Actin' like I was part of your property
Rememberin' all the times you fought with me
I'm surprised it got so far
Things aren't the way they were before
You wouldn't even recognize me anymore
Not that you knew me back then
But it all comes back to me in the end

You kept everything inside
And even though I tried, it all fell apart
What it meant to me will eventually be
A memory of a time when I tried so hard

I tried so hard and got so far
But in the end it doesn't even matter
I had to fall to lose it all
But in the end it doesn't even matter

I've put my trust in you
Pushed as far as I can go
For all this
There's only one thing you should know
I've put my trust in you
Pushed as far as I can go
For all this
There's only one thing you should know

I tried so hard and got so far
But in the end it doesn't even matter
I had to fall to lose it all
But in the end it doesn't even matter

Итак самый легендарный шутан всех времён и народов, вторая часть игры "период полураспада". Что можно сказать?
Шикарная для своего времени графика, которая и сейчас не режет глаз.
Отличный сюжет. 
Как по мне очень приятная стрельба. 
Если вы не играли в эту игру, то очень советую поиграть. Поверьте не пожалеете.

Хотелось бы отметить, что игра в отличие от первой части менее хардкорна. Припасов и аптечек +зарядов для костюма всегда будет хватать даже на тяжёлом уровне сложности. Если конечно вы хоть немного будете исследовать локации. Единственные места где мне пришлось реально попотеть это бой с летающими камбайнами и битва с 4мя страйкерами на площади. На самом высоком уровне сложности для их уничтожения надо 6ракет для каждого, а до ящика с боеприпасами ещё добежать надо...Головоломок вроде стало больше, но они куда проще. Хотя пару раз я не понимал куда идти и что делать...хотя игра очень линейна.

Hi, im Gabe Newell or you might know me better as Gaben. As you might know of one of our most popular franchize, Half Life, with its episode 3 cut, but after the release of Half Life Alyx, comes a form of a new game based on its ending. so we are working very hard on a sequal to Alyx, and well let you guess what its going to be about.
Is Half Life 2, what do you want me to say? Is just good.
крутая игра за 3 часа прошёл 10 раз рекомендую
10/10, the best video game of all time

Its Half-Life 2 the game speaks for itself

this game and the episodes are some of the best story in any videogame. PLUS the game immerses you into the story and it feels very realized. valve's style of storytelling in this game is still amazing 18 years later. there is more gameplay variety than Half Life 1, but the combat is kind of a step down. the guns just straight up don't feel that good, and the non-alien combat by itself is kinda boring. The puzzles and the gravity gun 1000% make up for that though. This was a revolutionary game in its storytelling, game design, and technology, more than the original.
9.5/10

Its flippin Half-Life 2...just buy it. Orange Box is op and nice Hat for TF2 comes with it called "Proof of Purchase" also get portal and all the Half-life DLC. Valve please pay me for shilling your 20 year old games!!
